title: Remove Dashboard tab and route from navigation

requirements.text: Remove the Dashboard tab UI element and its associated route from the navigation bar in App.tsx so users cannot access DashboardView.tsx from the tab navigation.
acceptanceCriteria: The Dashboard tab is no longer visible in the app's tab navigation bar
The route to DashboardView.tsx is removed from the routing configuration in App.tsx
Users cannot navigate to the Dashboard screen from any tab in the UI
All other tabs (Info, New Entry, Stats, History) remain functional and unchanged

constraints: Do not modify DashboardView.tsx file itself
Preserve all existing functionality in Info, New Entry, Stats, and History tabs
Do not change the InfoDashboardView.tsx component or its content
nonGoals: Deleting the DashboardView.tsx file from the codebase
Modifying the content or behavior of any other tab screens
Changing the overall navigation structure beyond removing the Dashboard tab
